message_format.subject: New Fashion Site
message_format.body:
Hi [FIRST_NAME], We wanted to tell you about a new fashion site we just launched. After spending countless hours browsing the web, magazines, and stores wishing we could own everything we loved, we did something about it. We started Gumball, www.getgumball.com , to work with top brands to giveaway the trendiest items and timeless classics. Our first giveaway is for a beautiful watch from Michael Kors anyone would love to have. Check it out and let us know what you think. Oh yeah, and good luck :)
Thanks, Gumball
